channel.title: Restaurant Reviews
channel.description: Restaurant reviews for Lab 7 RSS assignment.

item.title: Tijuana Flats
item.description: Tijuana Flats is Tex-Mex restaurant popular for it's hot suace bar. On Tuesday they have 2 tacos, chips and a drink for $5.00.

item.title: Chick-fil-a
item.description: Chick-fil-a is popular for their chicken sandwiches. They don't sell any beef. They basically have the best fast food chicken.

item.title: Sonic
item.description: Sonic is mainly known for their drink options. You can basically have any drink you want. The Reese's and banana milkshake is awesome.

item.title: Steak n Shake
item.description: Steak n Shake has pretty great burgers. Their food is extremely greasy and unhealthy, but their open all night, so it's awesome for late night meals.
